title: Good job on Xin Zhao bio and color story
body:
I had openly expressed my disappointment in displaying Demacia as a totalitarian hell fully committed to hypocrisy and so it's only right that I do the same when I see that it's not the sole image we get of it.

I don't have much to write though because the 2 lore entries speak for themselves:
https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_GB/champion/xinzhao/

Now I look forward for the incoming Demacia lore and comics (hoping that they won't exclusively talk about Garen and Lux situation).

replies.body:
Hey, thanks for this post. Good job being you!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Hey, I'm a man of honor and in this case I'm more pleased to be proven wrong with my previous argument rather than having to get away from the lore of a game I like.

Thank you for showing up and marking my thread with a tasty red mark :P
Now where's our Sona lore? She's still just a big-boobed Miku!

> [{quoted}](name=Yousosmart,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=i0hbtTMH,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2019-03-20T19:00:50.564+0000)
>
> Now where's our Sona lore? She's still just a big-boobed Miku!

As a Sona main I feel dissatisfied with just her bio and I don’t want to see her alt universe but a character with no dialogue is a uninteresting story to make about

Yeah, I really liked them.  Most enjoyment I got out of a Demacian story in awhile.  I really liked that they recognized the weaknesses of Noxus and they touched upon why the border states would rebel, without going into real detail, but still a start.   The economics of the story don't quite make sense, but, eh, that's a quibble.
I do love to see the split sides of it, and it was refreshing to see some of the good when it’s kinda been buried under the long amount of darkness we have been getting.

Indeed.

I hope they'll keep a good balance between them.

Indeed. Finally some lore for the side of good and order that doesn't paint them as actually being evil. 

Good story.
Also, nice nod to Alistar in Xin's colour story.

Indeed! xD 

It made me chuckle.
